Add.Title: 5 reasons why Orckestra Commerce Cloud is the omnichannel retail platform of choice
Add.Content:

With more than 217 million digital shoppers in the US expected in 2017, how can you optimize your online customer experience to attract and convert the new digital buyer?   Retailers have tremendous opportunity to boost online sales through customer experiences. Plus, when you win them over on your website, they’re far more likely to recommend you and shop in your stores. When digital interactions influence 36 cents of every dollar spent in a brick & mortar store, your online experience has to be OUTSTANDING!
